wiki.groups: [[Defenders]]; formerly the [[Avengers]], [[Fantastic Four]], and the Pantheon
wiki.education: Banner has a PhD in Nuclear Physics, the gray Hulk exhibited average intelligence and the green Hulk possesses a knowledge as banner does
wiki.aliases: Green Goliath, Jade Giant, Joe Fixit (gray Hulk)
wiki.relatives: Betty Ross Banner (wife, deceased), General Thaddeus "Thunderbolt" Ross (father-in-law), Jennifer Walters (She-Hulk, cousin), Morris Walters (uncle), Elaine Banner Walters (aunt, deceased), Brian Banner (father, deceased), Rebecca Banner (mother, deceased)
wiki.powers: Zombie Hulk has all of the powers and abilities of the 616 Hulk. However, the Zombie Hulk possesses the power cosmic.
wiki.significant_issues: Marvel Zombies #3 (gains cosmic powers after eating the Silver Surfer's head)
wiki.bio_text: It all started with a flash in the sky and a ripple through the clouds. Nobody knew what exactly caused this, but some think it might have been a punch. The hunger had made the unknown super hero so determined to satisfy his hunger that he ripped a hole in the very fabric of reality.
wiki.bio: It all started with a flash in the sky and a ripple through the clouds. Nobody knew what exactly caused this, but some think it might have been a punch. The hunger had made the unknown super hero so determined to satisfy his hunger that he ripped a hole in the very fabric of reality.
